EmailTemplate.name: Tracker Newsletter.Tracker Survey 2018 TEST
EmailTemplate.subject: Help us improve Tracker!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello there!
We’d appreciate it if you could take this brief survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/trkr2018_10]]>, which should take fewer than three minutes to complete.
Thank you in advance—your insights are invaluable and will ensure we evolve Tracker to support you in the best way possible.
Warmly, Your friends at Pivotal Tracker Take the survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/trkr2018_10]]>
